greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of Faulhaber numbers (numerators) read by rows.
comment: In the Gessel and Viennot reference f(n,k) = a(n,k)/A065553(n,k), n>=0, k>=0.
A093556(m,k)/A093557(m,k). See the Knuth reference given in A093556, and the W. Lang link. (End)
link: Ira M. Gessel and X. G. Viennot, Determinants, paths and plane partitions, 1989, p. 27, eqn 12.2
formula: sum(n>=0, k>=0, f(n, k)*t^k*x^(2*n+1)/(2*n+1)! ) is the expansion of (cosh(sqrt(1+4*t)*x/2)-cosh(x/2))/t/sinh(x/2).
results.author: _Wouter Meeussen_, Dec 02 2001
